class_notes: All nursing pre-reqs courses require department permission to enroll. For Emory SON  permission you must contact the Office of Education at nrsgpermissioninquiries@emory.edu for registration approval and support.
course_description: This course introduces nutrition science knowledge that emphasizes 1) basic biochemical functions and interactions of macronutrients/micronutrients and effect on human physiology, and 2) how nutrition research is used to develop dietary recommendations for individuals and specific populations.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3616, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 9-10:15a, Instructor: J. Frediani, Status: Closed
